relation: Cover page to the prologue of the Chosen Four.

I had an old piece of art I used as a placeholder for the comic's title and finally decided to put a real title page up. The hardest part of this was deciding on how I wanted the text, so I made two versions: One for the comic and one for fanart.

Darrow - #01 Messing around with some sketches, I decided to put them together into a comic that will eventually span all of Earthbound. A bit of a slow start, and I went through some trial and error, but now...the adventure begins.
Darrow - #10 Buzz Buzz tells of the chosen four and King takes his leave. After all is said and done, Buzz Buzz joins the party! ...But that guy doesn't.
Darrow - #99 While the Mighty Bear may not appear dangerous, don't be fooled. Under both of its smiles is something much more sinister.
